title: Autonomous Research Report: Multi-Scale Optimization with Hierarchical Refinement

executive_summary.hypothesis: Use coarse-to-fine optimization strategy for complex hologram patterns
executive_summary.methodology: Start optimization on low-resolution field, progressively refine resolution while transferring phase patterns
key_findings: Investigate hybrid approaches combining best-performing methods
Extend validation to real-world hardware implementations
executive_summary.practical_impact: Better global optimization, reduced local minima trapping
